title: HONOR Magic V5 Foldable Launch Set for July 12: Here’s What to Expect
summary: HONOR will launch the Magic V5 foldable phone on July 12 in China, with a thin design, Snapdragon 8 Elite chip, on-device AI, and a 6100mAh battery to challenge Samsung's foldables.

title: Don't Download 'Thug Life' From Tamilrockers, Other Piracy Sites. Here Are The Fines You'll Pay If You Do
summary: 'Thug Life', which marked the grand reunion of Kamal Haasan and Mani Ratnam after nearly four decades since their iconic collaboration in 'Nayakan', drew massive attention even before its release. Indian copyright laws are strict, with potential penalties reaching up to Rs 2 lakh in fines and possible jail time for those caught streaming or downloading pirated content.Beyond the legal ramifications, these piracy websites often serve as hotbeds for cyber threats.

title: iPhone 17: The Latest Leaks & What They Reveal
summary: The iPhone 17 series is shaping up to be an evolutionary update, focusing on refining existing features rather than introducing innovative changes. However, these updates may come with trade-offs, such as higher prices and ongoing concerns about battery life.
